hero.title: Enhancing Smiles with Expert & Trusted Dental Care
hero.subtitle: at Dr. Heba Hassan Clinic in Khalifa City
hero.description: Your smile is your signature, a reflection of your inner radiance. Experience world-class dental care in the heart of Abu Dhabi.
hero.doctorTitle: Renowned specialist oral surgeon with deep knowledge and expertise in dentistry

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a wide range of services to meet your individual needs.

items.title: Implantology
items.description: We are proud to offer NEOSS, a prestigious British implant system, renowned for its excellence and reliability. Our clinic utilizes advanced bone grafting techniques.

items.title: Cosmetic Services
items.description: Transform your smile with our high-quality veneers. Our veneers are designed to create a flawless and natural appearance, with a 10-year guarantee.

items.title: Restorative Services
items.description: From simple fillings to crowns and bridges, we provide high-quality restorations that look and feel natural.

items.title: Dental Surgery
items.description: Specialized in wisdom teeth removal and complex oral surgeries with expert care and precision.

items.title: Oral Hygiene
items.description: Regular check-ups and cleanings up to twice a year to maintain optimal oral health.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Experience exceptional dental care with our expert team dedicated to your perfect smile

doctor.name: Dr. Heba Hassan Mustafa
doctor.title: Specialist Oral Surgeon
doctor.qualifications: Master's Degree from Alexandria University, Expert Diploma in Implantology

testimonials.title: Patient Testimonials
testimonials.description: Discover what our patients say about their experience at Dr. Heba Hassan's Dental Clinic

items.name: Anju Joseph
items.quote: Dr Heba is the best dentist I had ever visited in my life. She puts maximum care to protect healthy teeth and makes sure to adopt the best and latest intervention to save the bad ones.I had best care with Dr Heba and will always choose her for the treatment.

items.name: Jancy Victor
items.quote: Dr Heba is very professional and friendly, one of the best Dr in Abu Dhabi. I highly recommend this doctor for dental problems.

items.name: Shaida Idris
items.quote: Dr. HEBA Indeed Professional  and attention to details Doctor . One  of the best Doctor  in Abu Dhabi.

items.name: Khamael Al Nuaimi
items.quote: I drive from DXB especially to see Dr Heba, most professional and kind and best dentist I ever worked with  Thank you Dr Heba
